description: Adds an external destination to your SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application. If you want Kinesis Data Analytics to deliver data from an in-application stream within your application to an external destination (such as an Kinesis data stream, a Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream, or an Amazon Lambda function), you add the relevant configuration to your application using this operation. You can configure one or more outputs for your application. Each output configuration maps an in-application stream and an external destination. You can use one of the output configurations to deliver data from your in-application error stream to an external destination so that you can analyze the errors. Any configuration update, including adding a streaming source using this operation, results in a new version of the application. You can use the  DescribeApplication operation to find the current application version.

parameters.name: ApplicationName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which you want to add the output configuration.

parameters.name: CurrentApplicationVersionId
parameters.description: The version of the application to which you want to add the output configuration. You can use the  DescribeApplication operation to get the current application version. If the version specified is not the current version, the ConcurrentModificationException is returned.

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: An array of objects, each describing one output configuration. In the output configuration, you specify the name of an in-application stream, a destination (that is, a Kinesis data stream, a Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream, or an Amazon Lambda function), and record the formation to use when writing to the destination. The name of the in-application stream. KinesisStreamsOutput (dict) --- Identifies a Kinesis data stream as the destination. The ARN of the destination Kinesis data stream to write to. KinesisFirehoseOutput (dict) --- Identifies a Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream as the destination. The ARN of the destination delivery stream to write to. LambdaOutput (dict) --- Identifies an Amazon Lambda function as the destination. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination Lambda function to write to. Describes the data format when records are written to the destination. Specifies the format of the records on the output stream.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the in-application stream.

nested_params.name: KinesisStreamsOutput
nested_params.description: Identifies a Kinesis data stream as the destination.

nested_params.name: ResourceARN
nested_params.description: The ARN of the destination Kinesis data stream to write to.

nested_params.name: KinesisFirehoseOutput
nested_params.description: Identifies a Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream as the destination.

nested_params.name: ResourceARN
nested_params.description: The ARN of the destination delivery stream to write to.

nested_params.name: LambdaOutput
nested_params.description: Identifies an Amazon Lambda function as the destination.

nested_params.name: ResourceARN
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination Lambda function to write to.

nested_params.name: DestinationSchema
nested_params.description: Describes the data format when records are written to the destination.

nested_params.name: RecordFormatType
nested_params.description: Specifies the format of the records on the output stream.

nested_items.name: ApplicationVersionId
nested_items.description: The updated application version ID. Kinesis Data Analytics increments this ID when the application is updated.

nested_items.name: OutputDescriptions
nested_items.description: Describes the application output configuration. For more information, see Configuring Application Output.

nested_items.name: OutputId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the output configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the in-application stream that is configured as output.

nested_items.name: KinesisStreamsOutputDescription
nested_items.description: Describes the Kinesis data stream that is configured as the destination where output is written.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Kinesis data stream.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that Kinesis Data Analytics can assume to access the stream.

nested_items.name: KinesisFirehoseOutputDescription
nested_items.description: Describes the Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream that is configured as the destination where output is written.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the delivery stream.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that Kinesis Data Analytics can assume to access the stream.

nested_items.name: LambdaOutputDescription
nested_items.description: Describes the Lambda function that is configured as the destination where output is written.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination Lambda function.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that Kinesis Data Analytics can assume to write to the destination function.

nested_items.name: DestinationSchema
nested_items.description: The data format used for writing data to the destination.

nested_items.name: RecordFormatType
nested_items.description: Specifies the format of the records on the output stream.
